title: California Firm Recalls Beef Products Due to Possible E. coli O157:H7 Contamination
summary: Editor's Note: This recall release is being reissued to expand the January 18 recall to include approximately 4.9 million additional pounds of beef and veal products, and to correct net weights from 40 lbs. to 50 lbs. in five instances in the earlier release. WASHINGTON...
impacted_products: 50 lb. boxes of "Huntington Meats Ground Beef"
